messages.content: Guess the riddle. "I save a history for those who is not blind. I can keep the better record, but you will not comprehend it. Friends of corpses in the past, but now I'm a friend and a witness of the girls' breakfast."
The answer is the diary. A diary is a history for those who is not blind. It can keep the better record, but people won't comprehend it. The diary is a friend and a witness of a person.
Yes. A photograph is a history for those who is not blind. It can keep a better record, but you will not comprehend it. The photograph is a friend and a witness of a person.
